conbody.p: In accordance with agency acquisition regulations, the contracting officer shall insert the clause at 52.228-7 , Insurance-Liability to Third Persons, in solicitations and contracts, other than those for construction contracts and those for architect-engineer services, when a cost-reimbursement contract is contemplated.
